text: The 2018–19 season is a season played by Anderlecht, a Belgian football club based in Anderlecht, Brussels. The season covers the period from 1 July 2018 to 30 June 2019. Anderlecht will be participating in the Belgian First Division A, Belgian Cup and the UEFA Europa League. ==Match details== ===Belgian First Division A=== ===Regular season=== ====Matches==== {|
